   19: %%
   20: -module(zlc_SUITE).
   21: 
   22: -export([all/0, suite/0, groups/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1,
   23:          init_per_group/2,end_per_group/2,
   24:          init_per_testcase/2,end_per_testcase/2,
   25:          basic/1,mixed_zlc/1,zmc/1,filter_guard/1,
   26:          filter_pattern/1,cartesian/1,nomatch/1,bad_generators/1]).
   27: 
   28: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("stdlib/include/assert.hrl").
   30: 
   31: suite() ->
   32:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   33:      {timetrap,{minutes,1}}].
   34: 
   35: all() ->
   36:     [basic,
   37:      mixed_zlc,
   38:      zmc,
   39:      filter_guard,
   40:      filter_pattern,
   41:      cartesian,
   42:      nomatch,
   43:      bad_generators].
   44: 
   45: groups() ->
   46:     [].
   47: 
   48: init_per_suite(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   49:     test_lib:interpret(?MODULE),
   50:     true = lists:member(?MODULE, int:interpreted()),
   51:     Config.
   52: 
   53: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   54:     ok.
   55: 
   56: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   57:     Config.
   58: 
   59: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   60:     Config.
   61: 
   62: 
   63: init_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   64:     Config.
   65: 
   66: end_per_testcase(Case, Config) when is_atom(Case), is_list(Config) ->
   67:     ok.
   68: 
   69: basic(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   70:     [6, 7, 8] = [X + Y + Z || X <- [1, 2, 3] && Y <- [2, 2, 2] && Z <- [3,3,3]],
   71:     [{1, 2, 3}, {2, 2, 3}, {3, 2, 3}] =
   72:         [{X, Y, Z} || X <- [1, 2, 3] && Y <- [2, 2, 2] && Z <- [3,3,3]],
   73:     [6, 24] = zipwith4(fun(A, B, C, D) -> (A + B + C) * D end,
   74:                        [1, 5], [2, 2], [0, 1], [2, 3]),
   75:     96 = dot([1, 2, 3, 4], [24, 12, 8, 6]),
   76: 
   77:     [1, 4, 5] = ifelse([true, false, true], [1, 3, 5], [2, 4, 6]),
   78: 
   79:     [8, 14, 20] = [X + Y + Z || <<X>> <= <<5, 10, 15>> && <<Y>> <= <<1, 2, 3>>
   80:                                     && <<Z>> <= <<2, 2, 2>>].
   81: 
   82: 
   83: zipwith4(F, As, Bs, Cs, Ds) ->
   84:     [F(A,B,C,D) || A <- As && B <- Bs && C <- Cs && D <- Ds].
   85: 
   86: dot(Xs, Ys) ->
   87:     lists:sum([X*Y || X <- Xs && Y <- Ys]).
   88: 
   89: ifelse(Tests, Xs, Ys) ->
   90:     %% Simulate R's ifelse(,,)
   91:     [case T of
   92:          true -> X;
   93:          false -> Y
   94:      end || T <- Tests && X <- Xs && Y <- Ys
   95:     ].
   96: 
   97: mixed_zlc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   98:     [{a, 2}, {b, 4}, {c, 6}] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>],
   99:     [{a, 2}, {b, 4}, {c, 6}] = [{X,Y} || <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>> && X <- [a,b,c]],
  100:     [{a,c,1,3}, {b,d,2,4}] = [{K1,K2,V1,V2}||
  101:                                  K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  102:                                      K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{c=>3, d=>4}, ordered)],
  103:     [{a,1,2}, {b,2,4}] =
  104:         [{K1,V1,Y} || K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  105:                           <<Y>> <= <<2,4>>],
  106:     [{a,1,2}, {b,2,4}] = [{K1,V1,Y} ||
  107:                              K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  108:                                  <<Y>> <= <<2,4>>],
  109:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [2,2,2]>>,
  110:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+V1)/integer>> ||
  111:                     X <- [1,2,3] &&
  112:                         _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  113:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(X+V1)/integer>> ||
  114:                     <<X>> <= <<1,2,3>> &&
  115:                         _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  116:     <<3,4,5>> = << <<(V1+V2)/integer>> ||
  117:                     _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2, c=>3}, ordered) &&
  118:                         _K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered)>>,
  119:     #{c := 3,b := 2,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3]},
  120:     #{c := 3,b := 2,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>},
  121:     ok.
  122: 
  123: zmc(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  124:     [{a,b,1,3}] = [{K1, K2, V1, V2} || K1 := V1 <- #{a=>1} && K2 := V2 <- #{b=>3}],
  125:     Seq = lists:seq(1, 50),
  126:     M1 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  127:     M2 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X || X <- lists:seq(1,50)}, ordered),
  128:     true = [A * 4 || A <- Seq] =:=
  129:         [X+Y+Z+W || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2],
  130:     true = << <<(A * 4):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  131:         << <<(X+Y+Z+W):64>> || X := Y <- M1 && Z := W <- M2>>,
  132: 
  133:     M3 = maps:iterator(#{X=>X*3 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  134:     M4 = maps:iterator(#{X*2=>X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  135:     true = [{A, A*3, A*2, A*4} || A <- Seq] =:=
  136:         [{X, Y, Z, W} || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4],
  137:     true = [A * 3 || A <- Seq] =:= [X+Y+Z || X := Y <- M1 && Z <- Seq],
  138:     true = << <<A:64, (A*3):64, (A*2):64, (A*4):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  139:         << <<X:64, Y:64, Z:64, W:64>> || X := Y <- M3 && Z := W <- M4>>,
  140:     true = << <<(A*3):64>> || A <- Seq>> =:=
  141:         << <<(X+Y+Z):64>> || X := Y <- M1 && Z <- Seq>>,
  142: 
  143:     M5 = maps:iterator(#{X =>
  144:                              case X rem 2 of
  145:                                  0 -> {ok,X};
  146:                                  1 -> {error,X}
  147:                              end || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  148:     M6 = maps:iterator(#{X*2 => X*4 || X <- Seq}, ordered),
  149:     [] = [X || {{X,{ok,X}}, {_,X}} <- lists:zip(maps:to_list(M5), maps:to_list(M6))],
  150:     [] = [X || X := {ok,X} <- M5 && _ := X <- M6],
  151:     [] = [X || X := {e,X} <- M5 && X := {ok,X} <- M5],
  152:     ok.
  153: 
  154: filter_guard(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  155:     [[1,2,1]] = [X++Y || X <- [[1,2], [2,-3]] && Y <- [[1], [2]], lists:sum(X)>0],
  156:     [{a,2}, {b,4}, {c,6}] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>,
  157:                                       Y rem 2 == 0],
  158:     [{b,4}, {c,6}] = [{X, Y} || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, Y =/= 2],
  159:     [] = [{X,Y} || X <- [a, b, c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, Y rem 2 == 1],
  160:     [{b,4}] = [{X,Y} || <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>> && X <- [a,b,c], X>a, X<c],
  161:     [{b,d,2}] = [{K1,K2,V1} || K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>1, b=>2}, ordered) &&
  162:                                    K2 := V2 <- maps:iterator(#{c=>3, d=>4}, ordered),
  163:                                V2 rem 2 == 0],
  164:     <<5>> = << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [2,2,2], X rem 2 == 1, X+Y>4>>,
  165:     #{c := 3,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y rem 2 == 1},
  166:     #{c := 3} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y rem 2 == 1, Y > 1},
  167:     #{c := 3,a := 1} = #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>, Y rem 2 == 1}.
  168: 
  169: filter_pattern(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  170:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([], []),
  171:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([a], [a]),
  172:     [] = do_filter_pat_1([{ok,a}], [{error,e}]),
  173: 
  174:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([], []),
  175:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([a], [b]),
  176:     [] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1}], [{b,1}]),
  177:     [{1,7}] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1}], [{a,7}]),
  178:     [{1,7},{10,20}] = do_filter_pat_2([{a,1},{b,9},{x,10}],
  179:                                       [{a,7},{wrong,8},{x,20}]),
  180: 
  181:     ok.
  182: 
  183: do_filter_pat_1(L1, L2) ->
  184:     Res = [{A,B} || {ok,A} <- L1 && {ok,B} <- L2],
  185:     Res = [{A,B} || {{ok,A},{ok,B}} <- lists:zip(L1,L2)],
  186:     Res.
  187: 
  188: do_filter_pat_2(L1, L2) ->
  189:     Res = [{A,B} || {Same,A} <- L1 && {Same,B} <- L2],
  190:     Res = [{A,B} || {{Same,A},{Same,B}} <- lists:zip(L1,L2)],
  191:     Res.
  192: 
  193: cartesian(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  194:     [{a,3}, {b,5}, {c,7}, {a,4}, {b,6}, {c,8}] =
  195:         [{X, W+Y} || W <- [1,2],
  196:                      X <- [a,b,c] && <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>],
  197:     [{a,3}, {a,4}, {b,5}, {b,6}, {c,7}, {c,8}] =
  198:         [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a,b,c] &&
  199:                          <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, W <- [1,2]],
  200:     [{a,4}, {b,6}, {c,8}] =
  201:         [{X, W+Y} || X <- [a,b,c] &&
  202:                          <<Y>> <= <<2,4,6>>, W <- [1,2], (W + Y) rem 2 == 0],
  203:     <<4,2,5,3,6,4>> = << <<(X+V1+Y)/integer>> ||
  204:                           X <- [1,2,3] &&
  205:                               _K1 := V1 <- maps:iterator(#{a=>2, b=>2, c=>2}, ordered),
  206:                           <<Y>> <= <<1,-1>> >>,
  207:     ok.
  208: 
  209: strict_list(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  210:     Seq100 = lists:seq(1, 100),
  211: 
  212:     [2,3,4] = [X+Y || X <:- [1,2,3] && Y <- [1,1,1]],
  213:     [3,4] = [X+Y || X <:- [1,2,3] && Y <:- [1,1,1], X > 1],
  214: 
  215:     [] = strict_list_mixed_1([], []),
  216:     [11,22] = strict_list_mixed_1([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,10},{i,20}]),
  217:     [13,25] = strict_list_mixed_1([{i,3},{i,4},{i,5}], [{i,10},bad,{i,20}]),
  218:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[bad,{i,5}],[{i,15},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  219:         catch strict_list_mixed_1([{i,3},bad,{i,5}], [{i,10},{i,15},{i,20}]),
  220:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,5}],[]}},_}} =
  221:         catch strict_list_mixed_1([{i,3},{i,5}], [bad]),
  222: 
  223:     [] = strict_list_mixed_2([], #{}),
  224:     [15] = strict_list_mixed_2([{i,3}], #{{k,4} => {v,3}}),
  225:     [15] = strict_list_mixed_2([{i,0},{i,3}], #{{a,0} => {a,0},
  226:                                                 {k,4} => {v,3}}),
  227: 
  228:     ?assertEqual([I * 3*I + 7*I || I <- Seq100],
  229:                  strict_list_mixed_2([{i,I} || I <- Seq100],
  230:                                      #{{k,3*I} => {v,7*I} || I <- Seq100})),
  231:     SimpleMap = #{{k,1} => {v,2}},
  232:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{a,3}],{{k,1},{v,2},none}}},_}} =
  233:         catch strict_list_mixed_2([{a,3}], SimpleMap),
  234:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],{{k,1},{v,2},none}}},_}} =
  235:         catch strict_list_mixed_2([], SimpleMap),
  236: 
  237:     [] = strict_list_strict_1([], []),
  238:     [11,22] = strict_list_strict_1([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,10},{i,20}]),
  239:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[bad,{i,5}],[{i,15},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  240:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},bad,{i,5}], [{i,10},{i,15},{i,20}]),
  241:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,4},{i,5}],[{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  242:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},{i,4},{i,5}], [{i,10},{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]),
  243:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{a,b,c},{i,5}],[{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]}},_}} =
  244:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},{a,b,c},{i,5}], [{i,10},{wrong_tag,7},{i,20}]),
  245:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,5}],[]}},_}} =
  246:         catch strict_list_strict_1([{i,3},{i,5}], [{i,7}]),
  247: 
  248:     [] = strict_list_strict_2([], [], <<>>),
  249:     [5,23] = strict_list_strict_2([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,2},{i,7}], <<3,9>>),
  250:     ?assertEqual([2*I * 3*I + I || I <- Seq100],
  251:                  strict_list_strict_2([{i,2*I} || I <- Seq100],
  252:                                       [{i,3*I} || I <- Seq100],
  253:                                       list_to_binary(Seq100))),
  254:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,2}],[{i,7}],<<9:7>>}},_}} =
  255:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,1},{i,2}], [{i,2},{i,7}], <<3,9:7>>),
  256:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[],[]}},_}} =
  257:         catch strict_list_strict_2([], [], []),
  258:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,0}],[],<<>>}},_}} =
  259:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,0}], [], <<>>),
  260:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,0}],[{bad,5}],<<99>>}},_}} =
  261:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,0}], [{bad,5}], <<99>>),
  262:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,20}],[{i,21}],<<42:7>>}},_}} =
  263:         catch strict_list_strict_2([{i,20}], [{i,21}], <<42:7>>),
  264: 
  265:     [] = strict_list_strict_3([], <<>>),
  266:     [45] = strict_list_strict_3([{i,42}], <<3>>),
  267:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],<<2>>}},_}} =
  268:         catch strict_list_strict_3([{i,1}], <<1,2>>),
  269:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],<<0:7>>}},_}} =
  270:         catch strict_list_strict_3([], <<0:7>>),
  271:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,1}],<<0:7>>}},_}} =
  272:         catch strict_list_strict_3([{i,1}], <<0:7>>),
  273: 
  274:     [] = strict_list_strict_4([], <<>>),
  275:     [100] = strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<42>>),
  276:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,100}],<<0>>}},_}} =
  277:         catch strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<0>>),
  278:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,100}],<<>>}},_}} =
  279:         catch strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<>>),
  280:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[{i,100}],<<0:8,1:1>>}},_}} =
  281:         catch strict_list_strict_4([{i,100}], <<0:8,1:1>>),
  282: 
  283:     NaN = <<-1:64>>,
  284:     [] = strict_list_5(<<>>, <<>>),
  285:     [3.14] = strict_list_5(<<0:1,1:1>>, <<32,0.0:32/float, 64,3.14:64/float>>),
  286:     [0.0,3.14] = strict_list_5(<<1:1,1:1>>, <<32,0.0:32/float, 64,3.14:64/float>>),
  287:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<>>,<<64,42.0/float>>}},_}} =
  288:         catch strict_list_5(<<>>, <<64,42.0/float>>),
  289:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<0:1,1:1>>,
  290:                               <<117,-1:117/signed,32,17.0:32/float>>}},_}} =
  291:         catch strict_list_5(<<0:1,1:1>>, <<117,-1:117, 32,17.0:32/float>>),
  292:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<0:1>>,<<64,NaN/binary>>}},_}} =
  293:         catch strict_list_5(<<1:1,0:1>>, <<32,42.0:32/float, 64,NaN/binary>>),
  294:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<1:1>>,<<64,NaN/binary>>}},_}} =
  295:         catch strict_list_5(<<1:1,1:1>>, <<32,42.0:32/float, 64,NaN/binary>>),
  296: 
  297:     ok.
  298: 
  299: strict_list_mixed_1(X, Y) ->
  300:     [A + B || {i,A} <:- X && {i,B} <- Y].
  301: 
  302: strict_list_mixed_2(L, Map0) ->
  303:     Map = maps:iterator(Map0, ordered),
  304:     [A * B + C || {i,A} <:- L && {k,B} := {v,C} <- Map].
  305: 
  306: strict_list_strict_1(X, Y) ->
  307:     [A + B || {i,A} <:- X && {i,B} <:- Y].
  308: 
  309: strict_list_strict_2(X, Y, Z) ->
  310:     [A * B + C || {i,A} <:- X && {i,B} <:- Y && <<C:8>> <:= Z].
  311: 
  312: strict_list_strict_3(List, Bin) ->
  313:     [A + B || {i,A} <:- List && <<B:8>> <:= Bin].
  314: 
  315: strict_list_strict_4(List, Bin) ->
  316:     [A || {i,A} <:- List && <<42:8>> <:= Bin].
  317: 
  318: strict_list_5(Wanted, Floats) ->
  319:     Res = [F || <<W:1>> <:= Wanted && <<Size:8,F:Size/float>> <:= Floats, W =:= 1],
  320:     Res = [F || <<1:1>> <= Wanted && <<Size:8,F:Size/float>> <:= Floats],
  321:     Res.
  322: 
  323: strict_binary(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  324:     Seq100 = lists:seq(1, 100),
  325: 
  326:     <<2,4,6>> = << <<(X+Y)>> || X <:- [1,2,3] && <<Y>> <= <<1,2,3>>>>,
  327:     <<2,4>> = << <<(X+Y)>> || <<X>> <:= <<1,2,3>> && {X, Y} <- [{1,1},{2,2},{2,3}]>>,
  328:     <<2,24>> = << <<(X*Y*Z)>> || X := Y <:- #{1 => 2, 3 => 4} && <<Z>> <:= <<1,2>> >>,
  329: 
  330:     <<>> = strict_binary_1(#{}, <<>>),
  331:     <<24:64>> = strict_binary_1(#{2 => {val,3}}, <<4:8>>),
  332:     ?assertEqual(<< <<(5*I * 3*I * I):64>> || I <- Seq100 >>,
  333:                  strict_binary_1(maps:iterator(#{5*I => {val,3*I} || I <- Seq100}, ordered),
  334:                                  list_to_binary(Seq100))),
  335:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{none,<<42:8>>}},_}} = catch strict_binary_1(#{}, <<42:8>>),
  336:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{none,<<42:7>>}},_}} = catch strict_binary_1(#{}, <<42:7>>),
  337:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{none,<<0:4>>}},_}} = catch strict_binary_1(#{2 => {val,3}}, <<0,0:4>>),
  338: 
  339:     <<>> = strict_binary_mixed_1(<<>>, #{}, #{}),
  340:     <<>> = strict_binary_mixed_1(<<1:2>>, #{}, #{}),
  341:     <<999:64>> = strict_binary_mixed_1(<<1:1>>, #{0 => {v,0}}, #{1 => {v,999}}),
  342:     ?assertEqual(<< <<I:64>> || I <- Seq100>>,
  343:                  strict_binary_mixed_1(<<0:100>>,
  344:                                        #{I => {v,I} || I <- Seq100},
  345:                                        #{I => {v,-I} || I <- Seq100})),
  346:     ?assertEqual(<< <<-I:64>> || I <- Seq100>>,
  347:                  strict_binary_mixed_1(<<-1:100>>,
  348:                                        #{I => {v,I} || I <- Seq100},
  349:                                        #{I => {v,-I} || I <- Seq100})),
  350:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<0:1>>,{0,0,none},{0,{v,7},none}}},_}} =
  351:         catch strict_binary_mixed_1(<<0:1>>, #{0 => 0}, #{0 => {v,7}}),
  352: 
  353:     Island = ~"skärgårdsö",
  354:     IslandSeq = lists:seq(1, length([C || <<C/utf8>> <= Island])),
  355:     ?assertEqual(<< <<I:8,C:32>> ||
  356:                      {I,C} <:- lists:zip(IslandSeq, [C || <<C/utf8>> <= Island]) >>,
  357:                  strict_binary_utf8(IslandSeq, Island)),
  358:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[4,5,6,7,8],<<16#ff,16#ff,"def">>}},_}} =
  359:         catch strict_binary_utf8(lists:seq(1, 8), <<"abc",16#ff,16#ff,"def">>),
  360: 
  361:     ok.
  362: 
  363: strict_binary_1(Map, Bin) ->
  364:     << <<(X*Y*Z):64>> || X := {val,Y} <:- Map && <<Z:8>> <:= Bin >>.
  365: 
  366: strict_binary_utf8(List, Bin) ->
  367:     << <<I:8,C:32>> || I <:- List && <<C/utf8>> <:= Bin >>.
  368: 
  369: strict_binary_mixed_1(Bin, MapA0, MapB0) ->
  370:     MapA = maps:iterator(MapA0, ordered),
  371:     MapB = maps:iterator(MapB0, ordered),
  372:     <<case N of
  373:           0 -> <<V1:64>>;
  374:           1 -> <<V2:64>>
  375:       end || <<N:1>> <= Bin && _ := {v,V1} <:- MapA && _ := {v,V2} <- MapB>>.
  376: 
  377: nomatch(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  378:     [] = do_nomatch_1([], []),
  379:     [] = do_nomatch_1([1], [a]),
  380:     [] = do_nomatch_1([1,2], [a,b]),
  381:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[1,2,3],[]}},_}} = do_nomatch_1([1,2,3], []),
  382:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3],[]}},_}} = do_nomatch_1([1,2,3], [a,b]),
  383: 
  384:     <<>> = do_nomatch_2([], <<>>),
  385:     <<>> = do_nomatch_2([a], <<1>>),
  386:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[2],<<>>}},_}} = do_nomatch_2([1,2], <<3>>),
  387:     ok.
  388: 
  389: do_nomatch_1(L1, L2) ->
  390:     catch [{X, Y} || a=b=X <- L1 && Y <- L2].
  391: 
  392: do_nomatch_2(L, Bin) ->
  393:     catch << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || a=b=X <- L && <<Y>> <= Bin >>.
  394: 
  395: bad_generators(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
  396:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{x,[1,2]}},_}} =
  397:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- x && Y <- [1,2]],
  398:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[],[4]}},_}} =
  399:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- [1,2,3] && Y <- [1,2,3,4]],
  400:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3,4],[]}},_}} =
  401:         catch [{X,Y} || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [1,2], X < 3],
  402:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[3,4],[]}},_}} =
  403:         catch << <<(X+Y)/integer>> || X <- [1,2,3,4] && Y <- [1,2], X < 3>>,
  404:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{<<1,2>>,a}},_}} =
  405:         catch << <<X:16>> || <<X:16>> <= <<1:8,2:8>> && <<X:8>> <= a>>,
  406:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generator,a},_}} = catch [X || X := X <- a && _Y <- [1]],
  407:     {'EXIT',{{bad_generators,{[d],[]}},_}} =
  408:         catch #{X => Y || X <- [a,b,c,d] && Y <- [1,2,3], Y > 1},
  409: 
  410:     ok.
